headline: Coinbase Global, Inc. (COIN): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Coinbase Global, Inc. on Stock Region Research’s Substack by Stock Region. In this article, we will summarize the Bulls’ thesis on COIN. Coinbase Global, Inc.’s share was trading at $375.07 as of June 26th. COIN’s trailing and forward P/E ratios were 70.50 and 64.94, respectively, according to Yahoo Finance. Coinbase […]
